title: Value of National Basketball Association franchises 2020
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Franchise value in million U.S. dollars for 30 number of Nba Teams.
The Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Nba Team New York Knicks and lowest at Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.
There is a difference of 3300.0 between the maximum Nba Team New York Knicks and minimum Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.
min_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Nba Team, and Franchise value in million U.S. dollars in each Nba Team on the y axis.
The Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Nba Team New York Knicks and lowest at Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Franchise value in million U.S. dollars for 30 number of Nba Teams.
The Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Nba Team New York Knicks and lowest at Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Franchise value in million U.S. dollars for 30 number of Nba Teams.
The Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Nba Team New York Knicks and lowest at Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies.
The second highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Nba Team Los Angeles Lakers.
The difference of Franchise value in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Nba Team is 3300.0.

Nba Team New York Knicks is higher than any other Nba Teams with value 4600.0, followed by Los Angeles Lakers, and Golden State Warriors. Down to Nba Team Memphis Grizzlies with the lowest value 1300.0.
The lowest value 1300.0 at Memphis Grizzlies is almost 2.17 times smaller than the average value 2123.0.
Summing up the values of all Nba Teams, we get total 63690.0.
